forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon sun pours forth, bestowing a gentle warmth to the bustling streets, albeit tempered by spirited winds sweeping in from the west. As the day progresses toward evening, you can feel the temperatures gradually settling into a comfortable embrace, inviting an easy stroll through the vibrant urban landscape. The skies are a brilliant canvas of clarity, exhibiting a beautiful dance of light that renders the city and its iconic structures striking against the soft blue.

As twilight approaches, the allure of this evening promises a clear horizon, with the possibility of lingering wisps of fog still clinging to the edges of the bay. Those familiar with the whims of coastal weather will recall that evenings tend to usher in a chill; thus, layering is advisable—perhaps a light jacket tossed over a casual shirt will suffice as you stroll through the Mission or along the Embarcadero. Engage with a book from your favorite café or sample the local fare as the sun dips below the skyline, wrapping the city in a lingering glow. Tonight, whether you choose to explore or simply savor the view, the serene, refreshing air will certainly enhance your experience.
